About Us

Mel Crews remains one of Dallas’ best kept secrets for over 25 years, offering individual attention to customers, wardrobe assistance, and the best of many European, Canadian, and US apparel and accessory designers.

The neighborhood boutique is disappearing, and we would love to be your specialty shop online, offering all the perks! Mel Crews and staff have 20-30 years in the apparel industry . The focus is you….the customer, and your needs. Trend appropriate clothing and accessories adapted to your lifestyle is our goal.

Specialty apparel & accessories..customized for you!
